channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Hush Puppies New Season Styles
channel.desc: Hush Puppies New Season Styles.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonds
channel.desc: Dedicated to lovers of diamond jewellery, this show presents a range of 9 carat gold jewellery that combines diamonds with amethyst, garnet, peridot, blue topaz, citrine and other favourite gemstones.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion Day Preview
channel.desc: Get a sneak peak at the upcoming Fashion Day. This is your chance to find out more about the new trends we'll be presenting, and to get your hands on some of this season's must-haves.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ichi Danish Fashion
channel.desc: Discover Ichi's creative fashion to uplift your wardrobe! Showcasing hand-drawn prints, bold designs and exceptional craftsmanship, Ichi will transform your look in a matter of moments. Find out how.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Winter Accessories
channel.desc: Accent your outfits to give your trusty cold weather looks more interest, and express your individuality with an eye-catching accessory. Give your wardrobe a new lease of life this winter.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Vionic Footwear with FMT Technology
channel.desc: A fashionable and comfortable footwear range with biomechanically-designed orthotic technology, which helps restore natural foot function and promote well-being with every step.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ichi Danish Fashion
channel.desc: Discover Ichi's creative fashion to uplift your wardrobe! Showcasing hand-drawn prints, bold designs and exceptional craftsmanship, Ichi will transform your look in a matter of moments. Find out how.

channel.title: Winter Accessories
channel.desc: Accent your outfits to give your trusty cold weather looks more interest, and express your individuality with an eye-catching accessory. Give your wardrobe a new lease of life this winter.

channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Vionic Footwear with FMT Technology
channel.desc: A fashionable and comfortable footwear range with biomechanically-designed orthotic technology, which helps restore natural foot function and promote well-being with every step.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Best of QVC Style
channel.desc: Catch all the recent highlights from our sister channel with the Best of QVC Style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Centigrade up to 50% off
channel.desc: Whatever your outerwear needs, Centigrade has it covered! You'll find a wide variety of coats and jackets in different styles, designs and materials - all with up to 50% off.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% off Frank Usher Sale
channel.desc: Up to 50% off Frank Usher Sale.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% Off Footwear Sale
channel.desc: A fan of fashionable footwear? Find a new pair or two and save up to 50% on a range of stylish and comfortable footwear in our sale.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% Off Fashion
channel.desc: Fill your wardrobe with gorgeous fashion from a host of big names, and save up to 50.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% Off Fashion
channel.desc: Fill your wardrobe with gorgeous fashion from a host of big names, and save up to 50.

channel.title: The Jewellery Box

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Accessories Gift Hall
channel.desc: Find the perfect gift with fashion accessories by some of our most sought-after brands. From chic purses and wallets to cosy PJs and slippers, there's something for everyone.
